QuestData.Title: Iron Rune Constructs and You: Rocket Jumping
QuestData.Description: Alright, $n; the time has come for you to climb inside this thing and learn how to use its basic abilities. When you're ready, get on the work bench and I'll get you situated inside the construct.$B$BYour first lesson is going to be using the construct's transportation system. You'll notice that the iron dwarves have set up special rune carvings around the dig site. Their constructs use those rune carvings to power up and fly from point to point. Try it with the rune carving I built here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Walt at the Explorers' League Outpost in the Howling Fjord wants you to use the Iron Rune Construct's Rocket Jump ability at Walt's Iron Rune Carving.$B$BDismiss your construct by dismissing it from the pet window once you have completed the quest.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Walt at the Explorers' League Outpost in Howling Fjord.
QuestData.CompletionText: Don't take any lip from these naysayers!
QuestData.RewardText: You're almost ready to take this work of art into the field, $n!
